caption.p: Nitrite quantification in supernatant of BALB/c peritoneal macrophage treated with Curcuma longa (400 µg/mL) and stimulated or not with Leishmania amazonensis. Data represents media ± standard deviation of experiment realized in sextuplicate; ∗p<0.05 when compared with untreated and unstimulated macrophage by Kruskal–Wallis and Dunn's multiple comparison test.
